text: 1.6: 2 T 2.24-261.6: 1 T 3.2-7Ndu mbe ndi fɨr saŋv, ndu mba gumgi gu mbigi nɨman tɨva mbatɨga thueŋ muuŋgi fhuv guma, ana vhɨra mbiga bavira man ki. Ndu mba khesharigi guma ndi fɨri. Mba guman tari mbe vhɨra Krais khothɨgɨp, mbe Fhe Bakɨme rɨmani nɨman, mbe tɨvi mbatɨgi zɨn ŋgɨrga fhu, mbe vhɨra rɨɨrɨɨi tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨp, wari won ndegi gu ndegmbori nzuai buni daaŋsurga fhu.
